entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Very slow in those type of calcs #92184
  • [API Proposal]: add `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #92181
  • `GetFromJsonAsAsyncEnumerable` extension default json serialize option is not the same as `GetFromJson` #92179
  • Examples where CSE does not handle trees marked `GTF_MAKE_CSE` #92170
    9.0.0
  • PLINQ `SelectMany()` generates Native AOT warnings #92169

Closed

  • CA1862 suggestion changing semantics of the comparison. #89740
    8.0.0
  • SIGSEGV (139) on Linux .NET 8.0rc1 while Debug'ging #92176
  • [API Proposal]: Add new api `Dictionary.GetValue(TKey key, TValue defaultValue)` in `System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary` #92172
  • Blazor size #92173
  • .NET 8 RC1 fails to NativeAOT compile when targeting ios-arm64 #91997
    9.0.0
  • Incorrect port from Socket.ReceiveFromAsync(SocketAsyncEventArgs) #92006
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make HttpClient.Send() available on .NET Standard 2.0 #91810
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Memory.Tests #91972
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi] Ongoing AOT work #92186
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Update the assert for BlendVariable #92183
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Add link to docs to interop error messages #92182
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Update HttpClientJsonExtensions.Get.AsyncEnumerable.cs #92180
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [mono][aot] Avoid compiling the same method multiple times during dedup. #92178
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix register resolution handling of RefTypeUpperVectorRestore #92171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [workloads] Opt into using package groups #92168
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Make src gen for property setters consistent with reflection #92167
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2268858 #92159
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Fix iOS library build by linking standard C++ library by default #92141
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix type parameter mapping logic in ILLink/ILCompiler #92139
    Servicing-approved, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Add remaining set of TensorPrimitives APIs for .NET 8 #92154
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Add link to docs to interop error messages #92125
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix support of FromKeyedServicesAttribute in ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #92144
    Servicing-approved, blocking-release, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix URL for syslib diagnostics #92160
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Fix iOS library build by linking standard C++ library by default #92114
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Check if bbNatLoopNum is not NOT_IN_LOOP #92132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use runsettings.targets to generate runsettings for host tests in local builds #92083
    area-Host
  • [workloads] Opt into using package groups #92155
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Improve binder gen binding logic (init, member binding, polymorphism) #92118
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • 6 more naive methods for Tensor Primitives. #92142
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Avoid marking property/event attributes multiple times #92153
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Set severity of rule CA1870 to warning #92135
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Disable failing apple mobile tests #92108
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Check if loop body occured before loopTop and if so unmark alignment #91918
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] changes in how sampling is done for DATAS #91712
    NO-MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement managed stack traces #2404

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Split RyuJit backend code into different files #2072

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Delete the CalendarData workaround #2403
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pop fewer virtual unwind frames explicitly #2402
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat.Task package no longer works with older SDKs #35468
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet watch run with args break hot reload #35465

Closed

  • APICompat resources are not shipping in the SDK - missing localization #29598
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Include APICompat resources #35467
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Include APICompat resources #35398
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • WIP: Add name argument for dotnet new #33810
    untriaged, Area-Templates

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 8.1.1 #69982
  • Collection expressions: Incorrect diagnostic reported for element conversion error with CollectionBuilder type #69980
  • Nullability warnings are not reported inside collection expressions #69979
  • Investigate how often `AbstractTypeMap.SubstituteTypes` returns an array equivalent to original and avoid allocation in this case #69976
  • `IsApplicable` allocates arrays in `GetParameterTypes` that are thrown away immediately #69975
  • `MethodTypeInferrer` shouldn't allocate HashSet array if there is a single type parameter #69974
  • Consider pooling `MethodTypeInferrer` #69971
  • Reduce `int[]` allocations from BadArguments #69969

Closed

  • 700MB of `TypeWithAnnotations[]` in `GetLeastOverriddenMember` #69977
  • spam #69978
  • Overload resolution doesn't work with collection expressions #69962
  • Only run Source-Generator driver in external process. #69694

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: verify element type when reporting conversion error to CollectionBuilder type #69981
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Performance] Avoid 500MB of HashSet enumerator allocations calling `Any` #69973
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [Performance] Avoid 1GB of Enumerator boxing allocations #69972
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [Performance] Reduce array allocations of BadArguments #69970
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for collection expressions in attributes #69968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Add new endpoint in roslyn to get token for multiple ranges #69946
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor error after update to .NET 8: Failed to start platform. #50755
  • Render Mode : Auto and Webassembly shows an error, render mode server works fine #50754
  • Improvements to the Blazor website #50752
  • Perf regression: plaintext #50751
  • Dictionary model binding behaves different with Enum as Key vs Value #50748

Closed

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #50739
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #50750
  • Persisting Data Across SSR and Blazor Server #50741

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2269066 #50757
    area-mvc

Updated

  • [Blazor] Prerendered state #50742
    area-blazor
  • Fix Set size in HttpLoggingOptions #50426
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] - Page of (first) FlyoutItem not loading when FlyoutHeader is available #17432
  • WebView RequestMediaCapturePermission #17431
  • Style inheritance broken for ImageCell #17429
  • [net8] Exception after setting `BindingContext` #17427
  • [net8] After switching from `net7` to `net8` build fails on `Android` #17426

Closed

  • .NET Maui Light mode does not display TextCells & Entry element correctly #17425
  • How to only have one theme & overwrite TextCell Style #17424
  • Error while setting up the Android emulator from Android Device Manager in Visual Studio #17415
  • Not able to add a frame in grid via c# code. #17346

PullRequests

Created

  • [net7.0] Backport Legacy Control Gallery #17434
  • Fix DragAndDropCleanupCode #17430
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17421
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Cleanup SwipeView and Propagate BC until we can fix compat layout #17418
  • Backport uitests #17420
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Split out sharable testing for non-element thing #17387
  • Fix iOS/Win InputTransparent layouts and add several UI tests #17286
    .NET 8 GA
  • Merge main into net8.0 #17419
    .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom key types with value converters throw in the compiled model #31770
  • IOrderedEnumerable violates the constraint of type TConcreteCollection #31768
  • Include SetAfterSaveBehavior as attribute [DatabaseGenerated] parameter #31767

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issues with the compiled model #31771

Merged

  • Make expression methods of list comparer private since they are not now needed for the compiled model #31758
  • Throw better exception when attempting to map a read-only collection as a primitive collection #31755
